attributes.action: abolish VAT on Sanitary Towels. In the event that this is not allowed under EU Rules we call upon the Government to reduce the VAT to the minimum allowed under EU rules.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT on sanitary towels etc is totally unfair and discriminitory against women. Its nothing more than a tax on women. The Government should abolish VAT on Sanitary Towels etc or if this is not possible under European Union rules than they should reduce the tax to the minimum.
